name: NewYorker
text: George Wallace’s candidacy for the Presidency was dismissed as a last gasp from the dying Jim Crow South. Now it is seen as a warning flare—and as a reminder that it was not only Donald Trump who conceived of Trumpism. https://t.co/AUFX2GMZza

name: NewYorker
text: This year, the weight of all “human-made mass” exceeded that of the earth’s entire biomass. "We now live on Planet Stuff," @BillMcKibben writes. https://t.co/emoxQPG7e9
